KUMAR NAGARAJAN
Senior Software Engineer
kumar.nagarajan@email.com | github.com/kumarngrjn | San Francisco, CA

SUMMARY
Experienced software engineer with 7+ years building scalable backend systems and cloud-native
applications. Passionate about clean architecture, developer tooling, and distributed systems.
Currently focused on TypeScript/Node.js and cloud infrastructure.

EXPERIENCE

Senior Software Engineer | TechScale Inc. | Jan 2022 – Present (3 years)
- Designed and built a real-time event processing pipeline handling 50K events/sec using Node.js and Kafka
- Led migration of monolithic API to microservices architecture, reducing deployment time by 70%
- Built internal developer platform with automated CI/CD using GitHub Actions and Docker
- Mentored 3 junior engineers; led weekly architecture review sessions
- Implemented distributed caching layer with Redis, reducing API latency by 40%
- Technologies: TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka, Docker, AWS (ECS, RDS, SQS), GitHub Actions

Software Engineer II | DataFlow Systems | Mar 2019 – Dec 2021 (2.8 years)
- Built high-throughput data ingestion service processing 5TB/day using Python and Apache Spark
- Designed REST APIs serving 3K+ RPS with 99.9% uptime SLA
- Implemented observability stack: Prometheus metrics, Grafana dashboards, PagerDuty alerting
- Contributed to open-source: authored a Prometheus exporter for custom application metrics (200+ GitHub stars)
- Led incident response for production systems; reduced MTTR by 50% through runbook automation
- Technologies: Python, Java, Apache Spark, PostgreSQL, Prometheus, Grafana, Terraform, AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda)

Junior Software Engineer | WebCraft Solutions | Jun 2017 – Feb 2019 (1.7 years)
- Developed full-stack web applications using React and Node.js
- Built automated testing framework that increased test coverage from 30% to 85%
- Managed deployments to AWS using CloudFormation
- Technologies: JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, AWS (CloudFormation, S3)

EDUCATION

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science | University of California, Davis | 2017

Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Java, SQL
